ucare.jaf.database
Class CPrepareCall

java.lang.Object
  ucare.jaf.common.CObject
      ucare.jaf.database.CPrepareCall
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, ILogger, IObject, IPrepareCall
public class CPrepareCall
extends CObject
implements IPrepareCall, ILogger

 sql를 사용하기 위한 클래스 java의 jdbc를 delph와 같은 형태의 크래스.
Example:
 BaseDB db = new BaseDB ();
 PrepareCall pc = db.createPrepareCall ();
 pc.open ();
 pc.call ("{? = call ddd [?,?]}");
 pc.setString(2, 'qqqq');
 pc.setString(3, 'qqqq');
 pc.registerOutParameter (1, Types.VARCHAR);
 pc.registerOutParameter (2, Types.VARCHAR);
 pc.registerOutParameter (3, Types.VARCHAR);
 DataSet ds = pc.executeQuery ().getDataSet ();
 pc.close ();

Version:
1.0
Author:
ha joung soo, hasoo88@dreamwiz.com
See Also:
Serialized Form
